elementSpec.desc: contains a reading which is marked as following the original, rather than being normalized or corrected.
contient une leçon marquée comme étant fidèle à l'original et non pas normalisée ou corrigée
contiene una lectura que se marca como fiel al original.
標誌原文中呈現出的文字，並未經過任何修改或規格化處理。
contiene una lettura codificata come conforme all'originale piuttosto che ad una versione normalizzata o corretta
正規化や修正が行われていない原形であることを示す．

exemplum.p: If all that is desired is to call attention to the original version in the copy text, orig may be used alone:

egXML.l: But this will be a meere confusion
And hardly shall we all be vnderstoode

exemplum.p: More usually, an orig will be combined with a regularized form within a choice element:

egXML.l: But this will be a meeremere confusion
And hardly shall we all be vnderstoodeunderstood
